DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation shift oral vitamin K antagonist first trimester instead use low molecular weight heparin ( LMWH ) throughout pregnancy pregnant woman antiphospholipid syndrome ( APS )
DOC.brief_title: Use Warfarin After First Trimester Pregnant Women With APS
DOC.detailed_description: Women randomly divide two group ; one subject anticoagulant therapy Enoxaparin throughout pregnancy subject anticoagulant therapy Enoxaparin first trimester Warfarin first trim termination pregnancy .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman APS diagnose accord revise classification criterion APS 2006 Sydney , Australia Early pregnancy body weight 5090 Kg Women systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) Women active thromboembolic disorder Women history previous thromboembolic disorder
